titleStmt.title: Londons glory or, The histor[y] of the famous and valiant London-prentice being an account of his parentage, birth and breeding together wi[th] many brave and heroick exploits perform'd by him throughout the course of his life; for the honour of London, and the whole ... nation.
titleStmt.author: J. S. (John Shirley), fl. 1680-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by W.O., sold by E. Tracy,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
